=== Current Issues ===
Installation fails - need boot options: pci=noacpi irqpoll. 

ACPI irq routing problem - Broadcom Corporation BCM4310 UART (rev 01) gets IRQ 0 (used by HW timer) and so does the  Nvidia GeForce Go 6150. No Wireless Network and No 3D graphichs. <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.20/+bug/110396|Bug #110396]]</nowiki>
